subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Ralston Turner’s clutch long-range shooting and Louisiana State’s hustling defense put an end to No. 10 Marquette’s 10-game winning streak, 67-59.
snippet: Ralston Turner’s clutch long-range shooting and Louisiana State’s hustling defense put an end to No. 10 Marquette’s 10-game winning streak, 67-59.
